alert.note: Alert for Ben Hill; Berrien; Brooks; Colquitt; Cook; Irwin; Lanier; Lowndes; Thomas; Tift; Turner; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued December 15 at 6:13AM EST until December 15 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 590 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 7 COUNTIES IN BIG BEND FLORIDA DIXIE JEFFERSON LAFAYETTE LEON MADISON TAYLOR WAKULLA IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 12 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL GEORGIA BEN HILL BERRIEN BROOKS COLQUITT COOK IRWIN LANIER LOWNDES THOMAS TIFT TURNER WORTH THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ABBA, ADAMS BEACH, ADEL, ALFORDS, ALMA, ASHBURN, ASHTON, ATHENA, BANNOCKBURN, BARNEYVILLE, BERRIEN CO A/P, BETHEL, BLUE SPRINGS, BLUE SPRINGS, BOWENS MILL, BOYD, BRADFORDVILLE, BROOKS CO A/P, BUCELL JUNCTION, BUCKVILLE, CABBAGE GROVE, CAPITOLA, CAPPS, CARBUR, CASA BLANCO, CHAIRES, CHAIRES CROSSROADS, CHERRY LAKE, CHULA, COOK CO A/P, COOKS HAMMOCK, COTTLE, COURTHOUSE, CROSS CITY, CROSS CITY AIRPORT, DAY, DILLON, DILLS, DIXIE, DRIFTON, EMPRESS, FESTUS, FITZGERALD, FITZGERALD MUNICIPAL A/P, GAMMAGE, GORDY, GREGGS, GROOVERVILLE, HANSON, HARDING, HILLIARDVILLE, HINES, HOBBY, HOPEWELL, IRWINVILLE, ISABELLA, JARROTT, JONESBORO, KILLEARN ESTATES, KILLEARN LAKES, LACONTE, LAKELAND, LOVETT, MACLAY STATE GARDENS, MADISON, MASSEE, MAYO, METCALF, MIDWAY, MONTICELLO, MOULTRIE, MOULTRIE MUNICIPAL A/P, NANKIN, NASHVILLE, OCILLA, OLD TOWN, PASCO, PERRY, PINE VALLEY, PINETTA, QUEENSLAND, QUITMAN, RED ROCK, SOPCHOPPY, SPENCE AIRPORT, ST. MARKS, SUNSWEET, SYLVESTER, SYLVESTER AIRPORT, TALLAHASSEE, TEETERVILLE, THOMASVILLE, TIFTON, VALDOSTA, VALDOSTA REGIONAL AIRPORT, WAKULLA SPRINGS, WATERLOO, WEBER, WESTWOOD, WORTH, AND YELLOW JACKET.
